name: Game Quiz 11
description:
It's that spooky time of year again, and the tragic souls of dead video game studios are walking the earth. Each skeleton represents a game - you must return them to the grave of their developer. 

Each skeleton will kindly give you a hint (top-centre of the screen) while you are carrying them - these should be answerable without any game knowledge for those without extensive knowledge of defunct game developers.

You have 6 minutes to return as many skeletons to rest as possible. Post a screenshot of your game over screen in the #games channel!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys or WASD to move
  • Walk near a grave or skeleton to determine the game or studio it represents
  • Mouse to aim, Left Click to fire a paralysing bolt
  • Space to pick up or drop a skeleton - you can only do this when they've been knocked out!

Tileset by AngrySnail: https://angrysnail.itch.io/pixel-art-graveyard-tileset

Sprites by me
